title: #252 - Dan Soder & ME
description:
Canadian dance ordered I hang on the man cave and talked about his new special on Netflix, hey show on Sirius XM call the bonfire of the host with big Jay and himself, we talk about that time in Calgary where we found a man crush on each other, and get gay as fuck.

To get my book "Life of the Party" click HERE: https://www.amazon.com/Life-Party-Stories-Perpetual-Man-Child/dp/1250030250

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
